content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Area
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (4.0, 0.0)
- Furnace at position (6.0, 0.0)

### Coal Extraction Area
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (40.5, -82.5)

### Iron Ore Extraction Area
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (-15.5, -50.5)

### Storage Area
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest at position (8.5, 0.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items from inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a furnace or other entities. For example, you encountered errors when trying to insert coal and iron ore when you had none in your inventory.

### Errors when using furnaces with full inventory
- Avoid attempting to insert items into furnaces that are already full. Check the inventory status of the furnace before adding more items to prevent inventory full errors.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to check the production status of the furnace before attempting to extract items. If the furnace has produced nothing, you will not be able to extract items.

### Errors when placing into a tile occupied by another entity
- Ensure that the tile you are trying to place an entity on is not already occupied by another entity. This will prevent placement errors.

### Errors when using furnaces with no ingredients
- Check that you have the necessary ingredients to smelt before attempting to use the furnaces. You received warnings about having no ingredients to smelt in multiple furnaces.

### Errors when using furnaces with insufficient fuel
- Ensure that furnaces have enough fuel to operate. You received warnings about furnaces running low on fuel, which can halt production.
